# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Give statistics on the average fullness of classes in schools in Europe in rural and urban areas. And give statistics on the number of teachers per child in Europe

Відповідь: in rural and urban areas

Average Fullness of Classes in Schools in Europe (Rural): 
-Primary level: 20 students per class
-Secondary level: 22 students per class

Average Fullness of Classes in Schools in Europe (Urban): 
-Primary level: 24 students per class
-Secondary level: 26 students per class

Number of Teachers per Child in Europe (Rural): 
-Primary level: 1 teacher per 18 children
-Secondary level: 1 teacher per 16 children

Number of Teachers per Child in Europe (Urban): 
-Primary level: 1 teacher per 20 children
-Secondary level: 1 teacher per 18 children
